column4: How can I make international characters easily on my US keyboard?
I remember something where I could press a certain key and then it would do a key combo
you probably have to set up your compose key
how do you turn on the compose key?
what desktop environment are you using? It should be somewhere under keyboards
It's been a long time since I've used it, but check under System > Prefs > Keyboard
I see something there that lets you pick a compose key but then how do you use it?
how do you make one of those Swedish A's with the circle over the top
